languages.text: "После сожжения ее прах был превращен в этот великолепный образец прочности и чистоты. Один из еретиков позарился на него".
"After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."
languages.original_text: "После сожжения ее прах был превращен в этот великолепный образец прочности и чистоты. Один из еретиков позарился на него".

traits.locale_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."
traits.speaker: Priest

traits.locale_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."
traits.speaker: Priest

languages.text: « Après l'incinération de Sa Seigneurie, cette sublime relique a été forgée à partir de ses cendres, pour symboliser sa résilience et sa pureté. L'un des hérétiques avait osé s'en emparer. »
languages.original_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."

traits.locale_text: « Après l'incinération de Sa Seigneurie, cette sublime relique a été forgée à partir de ses cendres, pour symboliser sa résilience et sa pureté. L'un des hérétiques avait osé s'en emparer. »
traits.speaker: Priest

languages.text: «Tras la incineración de milady, sus cenizas se convirtieron en esta magnífica reliquia; un ejemplo de resistencia y pureza. Uno de los herejes osó robarla».
languages.original_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."

traits.locale_text: «Tras la incineración de milady, sus cenizas se convirtieron en esta magnífica reliquia; un ejemplo de resistencia y pureza. Uno de los herejes osó robarla».
traits.speaker: Priest

languages.text: “夫人火化之后，她的骨灰被制成了这件辉煌的遗物，堪称是坚韧与纯洁的典范。然而，那群异端分子居然敢打这块宝石的主意。”
languages.original_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."

traits.locale_text: “夫人火化之后，她的骨灰被制成了这件辉煌的遗物，堪称是坚韧与纯洁的典范。然而，那群异端分子居然敢打这块宝石的主意。”
traits.speaker: Priest

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様が火葬された後、遺灰はこの壮大な聖遺物になりました。溌剌とした純潔の模範です。ですが、異端者の一人が、この遺物を手に入れようとしたのです」
languages.original_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様が火葬された後、遺灰はこの壮大な聖遺物になりました。溌剌とした純潔の模範です。ですが、異端者の一人が、この遺物を手に入れようとしたのです」
traits.speaker: Priest

languages.text: "Nach der Einäscherung ihrer Ladyschaft wurde ihre Asche zu diesem wunderbaren Relikt verarbeitet, einem leuchtenden Beispiel für Widerstandskraft und Reinheit. Einer der Ketzer hat es gewagt, es an sich zu nehmen."
languages.original_text: "After Her Ladyship's cremation, her ashes were made into this magnificent relic, an example of resilience and purity. One of the heretics dared to lay claim to it."

traits.locale_text: "Nach der Einäscherung ihrer Ladyschaft wurde ihre Asche zu diesem wunderbaren Relikt verarbeitet, einem leuchtenden Beispiel für Widerstandskraft und Reinheit. Einer der Ketzer hat es gewagt, es an sich zu nehmen."
traits.speaker: Priest
